title: Android 10 has turned my phone into a menace! The screen stays on. My settings say otherwise
content: I have a pixel 2 and Android 10 has turned my phone into a menace! The screens light ambient stays on. My settings say otherwise. It constantly stays on unless i press my power button to put it to sleep. Anyone elses device doing this? Its really draining my battery! It also has a spasm glitch attack if i receive a notification.the message will flash and disappear for a few moments!  Urgh shall i just got back to android 9!?
